Imports

cps, semaphore

Types

Cont = ref object of RootObj
  when cpsMutant:
      fn*: proc (c: var Cont) {...}{.nimcall.}

  else:
      fn*: proc (c: Cont): Cont {...}{.nimcall.}

  when cpsDebug:
      clock: Clock             ## time of latest poll loop
      delay: Duration          ## polling overhead
      id: Id                   ## our last registration
      fd: Fd                   ## our last file-descriptor
    
  when cpsTrace:
      filename: string
      line: int
      column: int
      identity: string

Procs

proc newSemaphore(): Semaphore {...}{.raises: [], tags: [TimeEffect].}
Create a new Semaphore. 
proc len(eq: EventQueue): int {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
The number of pending continuations. 
proc stop() {...}{.raises: [], tags: [TimeEffect].}
Tell the dispatcher to stop, discarding all pending continuations. 
proc init(c: Cont): Cont {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
proc writeStackTrace() {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
proc trampoline(c: Cont) {...}{.raises: [Exception], tags: [RootEffect].}
Run the supplied continuation until it is complete. 
proc poll() {...}{.raises: [KeyError, Exception, OSError], tags: [TimeEffect, RootEffect].}
See what continuations need running and run them. 
proc run(interval: Duration = DurationZero) {...}{.raises: [KeyError, Exception, OSError],
    tags: [TimeEffect, RootEffect].}
The dispatcher runs with a maximal polling interval; an interval of DurationZero causes the dispatcher to return when the queue is empty. 
proc jield() {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
Yield to pending continuations in the dispatcher before continuing. 
proc sleep(interval: Duration) {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
Sleep for interval before continuing. 
proc sleep(ms: int) {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
Sleep for ms milliseconds before continuing. 
proc sleep(secs: float) {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
Sleep for secs seconds before continuing. 
proc discart() {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
Discard the current continuation. 
proc noop() {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
A primitive that merely sheds scope. 
proc signal(s: var Semaphore) {...}{.raises: [KeyError], tags: [TimeEffect].}
Signal the given Semaphore s, causing the first waiting continuation to be queued for execution in the dispatcher; control remains in the calling procedure. 
proc signalAll(s: var Semaphore) {...}{.raises: [KeyError], tags: [TimeEffect].}
Signal the given Semaphore s, causing all waiting continuations to be queued for execution in the dispatcher; control remains in the calling procedure. 
proc wait(s: var Semaphore) {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
Queue the current continuation pending readiness of the given Semaphore s. 
proc fork() {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
Duplicate the current continuation. 
proc spawn(c: Cont) {...}{.raises: [], tags: [TimeEffect].}
Queue the supplied continuation c; control remains in the calling procedure. 
proc io(file: int | SocketHandle; events: set[Event])
Continue upon any of events on the given file-descriptor or SocketHandle.

Exports

Semaphore, ==, <, hash, wait, isReady, withReady
